description: PBX implementacija sa podrškom za VoIP/SIP.
Полный спектр конфиденциальных сервисов, включая VPN, электронную почту, IM и многое другое.
P2P digitalna valuta bez centralne vlasti.
notes: Please note that new, digital currencies may be very volatile. Complete loss of your investment is possible for a number of reasons (software errors or attacks, identity theft, etc.). Be prepared!

description: Šifrovani, decentralizovan email server.
notes: Bitmessage is a promising alternative to email, but it has not yet been audited by security professionals. Use at your own risk. If you decide to try out Bitmessage, make sure to generate a completely random ID to greatly reduce the probability of ID collisions.

description: Enterprise klasa računarske platforme sa stopostotnom binarnom kompatibilnosti sa RHEL-om.
OMEMO or OTR encrypted IM for iOS.

Cjdns is a networking protocol, a system of digital rules for message exchange between computers. “Instead of letting other computers connect to you through a shared IP address which anyone can use, cjdns only lets computers talk to one other after they have verified each other cryptographically.
Lagana email pratforma sa GPG podrškom.
Conversations is an open source XMPP/Jabber client for Android 4.0+ smart phones.
Персональный PaaS (Платформа-как-Сервис) принадлежащий вам и с которым вы можете сделать все что захотите.
Privatno i šifrovano dopisivanje.
A convenience and ease-of-use layer for use on top of dm-crypt.
notes:
Gentoo maintains [a guide](https://wiki.gentoo.org/wiki/DM-Crypt_LUKS) for dm-crypt with LUKS.

Arch Linux also maintains [a guide](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Dm-crypt_with_LUKS) to dm-crypt with LUKS.

Slackware Linux also maintains [a guide](http://ftp.slackware.com/pub/slackware/slackware-14.1/README_CRYPT.TXT) to dm-crypt with LUKS.

dm-crypt is available for DragonFly BSD.

description: Popularne GNU/Linux distribucije.

Protects you against tracking through “free”, centralized, content delivery. It prevents a lot of requests from reaching networks like Google Hosted Libraries, and serves local files to keep sites from breaking. Complements regular content blockers.
notes:
Decentraleyes is a Firefox add-on that emulates Content Delivery Networks locally by intercepting requests, finding the required resource and injecting it into the environment. This all happens instantaneously, automatically, and no prior configuration is required.

Decentraleyes is no silver bullet, but it does prevent a lot of websites from making you send these kinds of requests. Ultimately, you can make Decentraleyes block requests for any missing CDN resources, too.

description: Distribuirana društvena mreža.
A tool to secure communications between a client and a DNS resolver.
Poptpuno anonimno pretraživanje.
notes:
DuckDuckGo is a software-as-a-service (SaaS) hosted around the world that provides you with anonymous search results from [these sources](https://dukgo.com/help/en_US/results/sources). DDG open source components are [available here](https://github.com/duckduckgo).

There is also a DuckDuckGo hidden service at [3g2upl4pq6kufc4m.onion](http://3g2upl4pq6kufc4m.onion) for Tor users.

description: POSIX-compliant enterprise cryptographic stacked filesystem for GNU/Linux.
XMPP server napisan u Erlang/OTP za GNU/Linux i macOS.
File based encryption tool with support for Linux, Mac OS and Windows.
notes: EncFS is available for Windows through the “encfs4win” port.

description: OpenPGP dodatak za Thunderbird/Icedove.
notes: [Here is a guide](https://securityinabox.org/en/guide/thunderbird/linux/) by Security In A Box to encrypting your email with Mozilla Thunderbird, GNU Privacy Guard (GPG), and Enigmail. Also read the [Email Self-Defense guide](https://emailselfdefense.fsf.org) by the Free Software Foundation to learn how to encrypt your email messages.

description: Višekorisnički kalkulacioni server.
notes: The EtherCalc online service encrypts your data transmission with HTTPS, but data may be read by anyone who can guess the URL. Download and run your own EtherCalc server if you care about privacy.

description: Besplatna email i kalendar aplikacija sa GPG podrškom.
Besplatna Android prodavnica otvorenog koda.
Brz, stabilan i moćan GNU/Linux.
Свободная операционная система, основанная на BSD.
FreedomBox integriše zaštitu privatnosti na cheap plug serveru tako da svi mogu da imaju privatnost.
Decentralozovana mreža za otpor cenzuri.
FreeOTP is a two-factor authentication application for systems utilizing one-time password protocols.
notes: FreeOTP adds a second layer of security for your online accounts. This works by generating one-time passwords on your mobile devices which can be used in conjunction with your normal password to make your login nearly impossible to hack.

description: Višeplatformski soft switch softver sa VoIP/SIP podrškom.
Nekomercijalna otvorena alternativa za podržavanje besplatnih radio mreža u celom svetu.
Distribuirana društvena mreža koja poštuje našu privatnost.
Light and fast IM client for GNU/Linux and Windows—OTR support via plugin.
Disk encryption subsystem included in the FreeBSD operating system.
Sinhronizovani folder na vašem računaru ili disku.
Self hosted git server.
Besplatna OpenPGP implementacija.
GNUnet je potpuno besplatna P2P mreža.
Painless self hosted git service written in Go.

Gpg4win is an installation package for Windows (XP, Vista, 7 and 8) with software tools and manuals for email and file encryption on behalf of the German Information Security Agency. Gpg4win itself and all tools of Gpg4win are free and open source software. The software mainly uses public-key cryptography for data encryption and digital signatures.
OpenPGP расширение для Apple macOS Mail.
Open, free and neutral wireless network for everyone.
Višeplatformski IRC client.
notes: HexChat does not offer encrypted IRC by default. You need to enable the FiSHLiM plugin for IRC message encryption.

description: Šifrujte komunikaciju između hiljada sajtova.
Nevidljivi internet projekat.
Highly scalable and configurable messaging platform based on the MTA qmail.
Install and configure mail server packages automatically in GNU/Linux and BSD.
Šifrovano dipisivanje i razgovori.
Приложение для Android устройств со встроенной поддержкой PGP.
VoIP/SIP server sa otvorenim kodom.
KeePassDroid is an implementation of the KeePass Password Safe for Android. Read/write support for .kdb and KeePass 1.x. Read/write support for .kdbx and KeePass 2.x.

Application for people with extremely high demands on secure personal data management. Saves many different types of information such as usernames, passwords, urls, attachments and comments in one single database.
Groupware server za email, kalendar, imenik i sinhronizaciju sa mobilnim uređajima.
Secure Kolab accounts hosted in Switzerland for 8.99 CHF per month or 4.55 CHF for email-only accounts.
notes:
Kolab Now is hosted in Switzerland and benefits from the [strong Swiss privacy laws](https://KolabNow.com/privacy). It is run exclusively with Free Software and using the service supports the development of [Kolab](https://kolab.org).

Also, you can export all your data at any time and the terms of service received the best rating from [ToS;DR](http://tosdr.org/#mykolab-com).

The service uses [Perfect Forward Secrecy](https://kolabnow.com/faq?nid=189) and identifying information [is stripped](https://kolabnow.com/faq?nid=190) from email headers.

description: KDE email Klijent sa GPG podrškom.
A GNU/Linux-libre distribution for embedded devices.
Šifrovani klijent za razgovore i video pozive.
notes: Encryption is only supported for voice and video, but not for instant messaging.

description: Litecoin (sign : Ł ; code : LTC) is a peer-to-peer cryptocurrency and open source software project released under the MIT/X11 license. Inspired by and technically nearly identical to Bitcoin (BTC), Litecoin creation and transfer is based on an open source protocol and is not managed by any central authority. Litecoin is intended by its developers to improve upon Bitcoin and offers three key differences.
notes: Please note that new, digital currencies may be very volatile. Complete loss of your investment is possible for a number of reasons (software errors or attacks, identity theft, etc.). Be prepared!

description: OpenPGP šifrovanje za webmail.
Besplatan virtualni atlas.
Decentralizovana platforma za objavljivanje medija.
notes: MediaGoblin does not encrypt any of your data by default.

description: Метапоисковая система, проксирующая ваши запросы на несколько других поисковых систем.
notes: No use of Cookies, Session IDs or anything else. Free Proxy, server side anonymisation of IP addresses, Tor branch.

description: XMPP serverski softver baziran na Prosody, sa naprednim mogućnostima za menadžment i mikrobloging.
Monero is a secure, private, untraceable P2P currency.
notes: Please note that new, digital currencies may be volatile. Complete loss of your investment is possible for a number of reasons (software errors or attacks, identity theft, etc.). Be prepared!

description: Privatni decentralizovani server za društvene mreže.
Internet pregledač otvorenog koda.
Email aplikacija otvorenog koda.
notes:
Thunderbird does not encrypt your email by default. [Here is a guide](https://securityinabox.org/en/guide/thunderbird/linux/) by Security In A Box to encrypting your email with Mozilla Thunderbird, GNU Privacy Guard (GPG), and Enigmail.

Thunderbird can optionally connect over Tor with the TorBirdy addon.

While Thunderbird can be used as a chat and IRC client, it does not offer encrypted messaging.

description: Šifrovani razgovori niske latencije.
Distribuirani DNS baziran na Bitcoin tehnologiji.
Uključi JavaScript, Java i Flash samo na web stranicama kojima veruješ.

A free dynamic DNS service. Use it to update an easy DNS name with your changing/hard-to-remember IP address. As we use the standard protocols, we support a lot of routers / update clients and we even actively help you to configure them. We care for your security, privacy and comfort. You can simply use the free service available on our homepage or, if you prefer, you can also run the software on your own server.
Sigurno pretraživanje za iOS.
OpenKeychain is an OpenPGP implementation for Android.

The Open Source Routing Machine or OSRM is a C++ implementation of a high-performance routing engine for shortest paths in road networks. Licensed under the permissive 2-clause BSD license, OSRM is a free network service. OSRM supports Linux, FreeBSD, Windows, and Mac platform.
notes: OSRM should be installed and run locally on your PC to avoid potential data leaks from the unencrypted online service.

description: Альтернативная веб-аналитика с открытым исходным кодом
Безопасная BSD операционная система.
Višeplatformski XMPP server napisan u Java programskom jeziku.
Potpuna DNS neutralnost.
notes: OpenNIC has not adopted an official policy concerning log query privacy/anonymization. More information [here](https://wiki.opennic.org/opennic:tier2).

description: Besplatne mape širom sveta.
Besplatan VPN kliejnt.
A GNU/Linux distribution for embedded devices.
Tor proxy za Android.
OsmAnd (OSM Automated Navigation Directions) is a map and navigation app that uses OpenStreetMap data.

Password Safe (Android Port). Stores passwords, site URLs, email addresses, notes and much more into encrypted container file, so you only need to remember one master password. Can generate random passwords (with optional site-specific policies).

Password Safe (Windows/Linux), designed by Bruce Schneier. Stores passwords, site URLs, email addresses, notes and much more into encrypted container file, so you only need to remember one master password. Can generate random passwords (with optional site-specific policies).
Besplatna platforma za internet galerije.
notes: Piwigo does not encrypt any of your data by default.

description: Otvorenog koda, lično hostovana platforma za internet analizu.
Tracking blocker that tries to learn who is spying on you and then blocks these ads and invisible trackers.
notes: Privacy Badger may be less effective than a classic blacklist based solution such as uBlock or Disconnect. Advertisers can automatically unblock themselves by claiming not to track you.

description: Fleksibilan i lagan XMPP server napisan u Lua programskom jeziku.
Multi-platform IM client for power users with built-in OTR support.
Lično hostovan steam server.
Мгновенно превратите любой сервер в платформу файлообмена.
Основанная на Fedora/Xen операционная система созданная для обеспечения высокого уровня безопасности с помощью изоляции.
Hubzilla is a powerful platform for creating interconnected websites (hubs) featuring a decentralized identity, communications, and permissions framework built using common webserver technology.
Potkuno besplatna Android platforma.
Besplana i sigurna P2P komunikaciona platforma.
notes:
Note that RetroShare has not been thoroughly audited by security professionals for possible security issues.

For those of you without a server, RetroShare is probably the easiest way to start your own encrypted social network.

description: Ring is a secure and distributed voice, video and chat communication platform that requires no centralized server and leaves the power of privacy in the hands of the user.

Riot is a secure collaboration app for group chat, file transfer and voice/video conferencing built on the decentralized Matrix ecosystem, providing bridges and integrations to centralized services such as IRC, Slack, Gitter, etc
notes: End-to-end encryption is in beta on Web as of Nov 5th 2016, with other platforms following week of Nov 14th

description: Sigurni i privatni email nalozi.
notes: Riseup's services may also be accessed via their Tor Hidden Service addresses. A list is [available here](https://www.riseup.net/en/tor#riseups-tor-hidden-services).

description: Višenamenski komunikacioni alat.
The personal, minimalist, super-fast, no-database delicious clone.
A fork of TextSecure with SMS encryption.
Lično hostovana verzija cloud servisa.
Privatni internet pretraživač.
notes:
Startpage is a SaaS hosted in the USA and the Netherlands that provides you with anonymous Google search and image results through a free proxy. Its sibling project ixquick.eu, however, offer results from other search engine.

 Ixquick also provides the stand-alone Ixquick Proxy service that allows users to open search results via proxy.

 As of February 19, 2015, Startpage.com is the default search engine in the Tor Browser.

description: Email klijent lak i razumljiv za korisnike.
Continuous decentralized file synchronization.
notes: Syncthing is a self-hosted file sharing platform, so none of your data is ever stored anywhere other than on your computers. There is no central server that might be compromised, legally or illegally. All communication is secured using TLS. The encryption used includes perfect forward secrecy to prevent any eavesdropper from gaining access to your data. Every node is identified by a strong cryptographic certificate. Only nodes you have explicitly allowed can connect to your cluster.

description: Besplatan i otvoren cloud servis.
Live CD/USB distribucije dizajnirane da štite privatnost.
Višeplatformski XMPP server napisan u Java programskom jeziku.
Free software daemon that uses tunnelling and encryption to create a secure private network

Tor (previously TOR, an acronym for The Onion Router)[not in citation given] is free software for enabling online anonymity. Tor directs Internet traffic through a free, worldwide, volunteer network consisting of more than four thousand relays to conceal a user's location or usage from anyone conducting network surveillance or traffic analysis. Using Tor makes it more difficult to trace Internet activity, including “visits to Web sites, online posts, instant messages, and other communication forms”, back to the user and is intended to protect the personal privacy of users, as well as their freedom and ability to conduct confidential business by keeping their internet activities from being monitored.
Šifrovano anonimno pretraživanje.
Заставляет Thunderbird и Icedove использовать Tor.
notes: TorBirdy is in beta and should be considered experimental. Please make sure that before using it, you are aware of the known issues and leaks by reading the “Before using TorBirdy” and “Known TorBirdy” Issues sections on the project website.

description: Free and open-source, peer-to-peer, encrypted instant messaging and video calling software. The stated goal of the project is to provide secure yet easily accessible communication for everyone.
notes:
Tox is a new encrypted communications system in the making. It is built upon a well known encryption library and has great potential, but it has not yet been audited by security professionals. Use at your own risk. If you decide to try out Tox, be sure to leave them feedback.

Tox does not yet have an official GUI but [several are recommended by the development team](https://wiki.tox.chat/Binaries).

description: Tunnelblick is a free, open source graphic user interface for OpenVPN on macOS. It provides easy control of OpenVPN client and/or server connections.
An efficient blocker for Firefox and Chromium. Fast and lean.
Validating, recursive, and caching DNS server.
Meta search engine that protects privacy and intends to return neutral search results.
notes: Unbubble is a web search engine from Germany providing results in eight languages. Its primary goal is to create neutral search results. It takes strong measures to protect privacy.

description: Client-side encrypted image host web server.
notes: Up1 is a simple host that client-side encrypts images, text, and other data, and stores them, with the server knowing nothing about the contents. It has the ability to view images, text with syntax highlighting, short videos, and arbitrary binaries as downloadables.

description: wallabag is a self hostable application for saving web pages. Unlike other services, wallabag is free (as in freedom) and open source.
Proširiv i prilagodljiv čet klijent za IRC i XMPP/Jabber.
Форсирующая использование Tor операционная система, стремящаяся к анонимности, приватности и безопасности. Предлагает так-же готовые к использованию образы для виртуальных машин.
Besplatan CMS za sajt/blog.
notes: WordPress does not encrypt any of your data by default. Using avatars in WordPress will activate Gravatar, which which will send your email address to gravatar.com. Avatars are activated by default and can be turned off under “Settings > Discussion > Avatars”. The default WordPress themes force your visitors to download Google Fonts. Consider switching to a completely self-hosted theme. You can also install the plugin “Disable Google Fonts” to remove this vulnerability.

description: Besplatan CMS za objavljivanje medija.
notes: Zenphoto does not encrypt any of your data by default.

description: Simple password manager using gpg and ordinary unix directories.
The most comprehensive and integrated Free / Libre / Open Source software suite ever developed.
Self-hosted, zero-knowledge, real-time collaborative documents.
notes: Encryption carried out in your web browser protects the data from the server, the cloud, and the NSA. The secret encryption key is stored in the URL fragment identifier which is never sent to the server but is available to javascript, so by sharing the URL, you give authorization to others who want to participate. Users must still take care to share links over an end-to-end-encrypted medium for best effect.

description: Android application compatible with ZX2C4's Pass command line application.
